Description_lang: Increases Drain Life healing by $s1% while your health is at or below $s2% health. Damage done by your Agony, $?a445465[Wither][Corruption], Unstable Affliction, and Malefic Rapture is increased by $s3% when your target is at or below $s4% health.

description_blz.en_US:
Increases Drain Life healing by 30% while your health is at or below 35% health. 

Damage done by your Agony, Corruption, Unstable Affliction, and Malefic Rapture is increased by 10% when your target is at or below 35% health.
description_blz.es_MX:
Aumenta un 30% la sanación de Drenar vida mientras tienes un 35% de salud o menos. 

El daño infligido por tu Agonía, Corrupción, Aflicción inestable y Rapto maléfico aumenta un 10% cuando tu objetivo tiene un 35% de salud o menos.
description_blz.pt_BR:
Aumenta em 30% a cura de Drenar Vida quando você tem 35% ou menos dos pontos de vida. 

Seu dano causado com Agonia, Corrupção, Agonia Instável e Arrebatamento Maléfico aumenta em 10% quando seu alvo tem 35% ou menos dos pontos de vida.
description_blz.de_DE:
Erhöht die Heilung von 'Blutsauger' um 30%, während Eure Gesundheit bei höchstens 35% liegt.

Der verursachte Schaden von 'Agonie', 'Verderbnis', 'Instabiles Gebrechen' und 'Unheilvolle Euphorie' ist um 10% erhöht, wenn die Gesundheit Eures Ziels bei höchstens 35% liegt.
description_blz.en_GB:
Increases Drain Life healing by 30% while your health is at or below 35% health. 

Damage done by your Agony, Corruption, Unstable Affliction, and Malefic Rapture is increased by 10% when your target is at or below 35% health.
description_blz.es_ES:
Aumentará un 30% la sanación de Drenar vida mientras tengas un 35% o menos de salud.

El daño infligido por Agonía, Corrupción, Aflicción inestable y Éxtasis maléfico aumenta un 10% cuando tu objetivo tiene un 35% o menos de salud.
description_blz.fr_FR:
Augmente les soins de Drain de vie de 30 % tant que vos points de vie sont égaux ou inférieurs à 35 % de votre maximum. 

Les dégâts infligés par vos techniques Agonie, Corruption, Affliction instable et Extase maléfique sont augmentés de 10 % tant que votre cible a 35 % de ses points de vie ou moins.
description_blz.it_IT:
Aumenta le cure fornite da Risucchio di Vita del 30% quando si ha meno del 35% della salute massima.

Aumenta i danni inflitti da Agonia, Corruzione, Afflizione Instabile ed Estasi Malefica del 10% quando il bersaglio ha meno del 35% della salute massima.
description_blz.ru_RU:
Когда у вас 35% здоровья или менее, исцеление от "Похищения жизни" усиливается на 30%. 

Если у цели 35% здоровья или менее, "Агония", "Нестабильное колдовство", "Порча" и "Пагубный восторг" наносят на 10% больше урона.
description_blz.ko_KR:
자신의 생명력이 35% 이하면 생명력 흡수의 치유량이 30%만큼 증가합니다. 

대상의 생명력이 35% 이하면 고통, 부패, 불안정한 고통, 사악한 환희의 공격력이 10%만큼 증가합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW:
在你的生命力降至35%以下時，吸取生命的治療效果提高30%。

在你目標的生命力降至35%以下時，你的痛苦、腐蝕術、痛苦動盪和邪惡狂喜造成的傷害提高10%。
description_blz.zh_CN:
当你的生命值等于或低于35%时，吸取生命的治疗效果提高30%。

当你的目标的生命值等于或低于35%时，你的痛楚、腐蚀术、痛苦无常和灾难狂欢造成的伤害提高10%。
